short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically responds to marketplace Facebook Messages

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Automatically reply to messages received on Facebook Marketplace.

Are you tired of seeing "Hey, is this available?". Automatically reply with whatever you want to get marketplace transactions to happen quicker.

Pin the app to your chrome and click on the item to visit the options page. Here you can set the phrases you want to automatically reply with. 

IMPORTANT:
1. User must be logged into Messenger on Facebook Marketplace tab for the application to auto reply (you must have the tab open and be on that tab--if you navigate away to another tab the bot cannot message back), 
2. Application will only auto reply on Messenger Facebook Marketplace when the messenger language setting is English (the page must be in english for the bot to reply)

Keywords:
Facebook Marketplace Bot
Facebook Marketplace Auto Responder
Bots on Facebook Marketplace
